Hides the enclosed condition so that it is still required but cannot be seen by human players and displays the specified tooltip in its place.
Returns true if the country has employed an with the specified characteristics.(Any combinations of type, home_religion and home_culture are permitted.)
Returns true if the X in the country has at least Y influence.
Returns true if the X in the country has at least Y loyalty.
Returns true if the X in the country controls at least Y% of the total development.
Returns true if the X of the country has at least Y influence.
Returns true, if the country still has and had the specified policy for at least X days.
Returns true if the consort flag X was last set at least Y days ago
Returns true if the country flag X was last set for the country at least Y days ago.
Returns true if the global flag X was last set at least Y days ago.
Returns true if the heir flag X was last set at least Y days ago
Returns true if the province flag X was last set for the province at least Y days ago.
Returns true if the ruler flag X was last set for the current ruler at least Y days ago
Returns true if the country has a of type X against country Y.
Returns true if the progress of the specified disaster is at least X in the country.
Returns true if the X in the country has the influence modifier Y.
Returns true if the X in the country has the loyalty modifier Y.
Returns true if the value of the specified modifier is at least X for the country.
Returns true if the country has a with at least the specified stats.admiral = yes and general = yes can be used as further limitation.
Returns true if the value of the specified modifier is at least X for the province.
Returns true if the country has at least "value" opinion of the country specified by "who".
Returns true if opinion difference between country X and Y, is at least Z
Returns true if the country has the opinion modifier "modifier" towards the country specified by "who".Can also specify a value of the modifier (but it is not displayed).
Returns true if the country X has a of at least the specified size in the country.
Returns true if the country has a of at least the specified size in country X.
Returns true the specified country has the trade modifier X in the trade node.
Hides the enclosed conditions so that they are still required but cannot be seen by human players.
Returns true, if the value of the specified incident is at least X.
Returns true if the country has embraced at least X more than the specified country.

Returns true if the country is at and the mentioned conditions are fulfilled. Possible are: attacker_leader, defender_leader, casus_belli, defenders, attackers, participants, war_score, start_date, duration, war_goal_province.
Returns true if the specified variable is equal to X.
Returns true, if the country's military strength (army size & navy size combined) is at least the size of X times the military strength of the specified country
Returns true, if the country's navy size is at least the size of X times the navy size of the specified country.
Returns true if at least X provinces of the scoped country match the specified condition(s).

Float value: Returns true if the ratio of the provinces with the specified religion to the total provinces of the country is at least X.Integer value: Returns true if the country has at least X provinces with the specified religion.It is also possible to specify the secondary religion by secondary = yes.
Returns true if the specified country has at least X units of the specified type in the province. (type and who are not needed, if not included will default to all.)
Returns true if the country has at least X trade power from in the trade node.
Returns true if the country is the of the X.
Returns true, if the distance between specified provinces is at least X.
Returns true if the specified religion is enabled for at least X years.
Returns true, if the country has the specified religious school.
Returns true if the country specified by "who" has at least "value" opinion of the country.
Returns true if the country specified by "who" has the opinion modifier "modifier" towards the country.Can also specify a value of the modifier (but it is not displayed).
Returns true if the country controls at least X% of the in the specified.
Returns true if the country has the ‘[[trading in]]’ bonus of the specified trade good.
Returns true if the country has access to X% of the world market of the specified.
Returns true, if the country has the specified trading policy in the specified trade node. Can also use policy = any.
Returns true if the current scope has a trust level of at least X with the specified tag.

Can use variable effects and triggers to compare or change and compare modifier and trigger values. variable_arithmetic_trigger sections can include more variable_arithmetic_trigger sections. This has to be done for effects such as change_variable or effects of if sections inside the  since the game may crash otherwise.
Returns true if the coutry has a of at least X against the specified country.
Returns true if the country is in a under the specified country for at least X years.
Returns true if the country is a of the specified country for at least X years.
